summary: Completed testing of Kreditversicherung (Credit Insurance) feature. All 14 backend API tests pass (100%). Frontend navigation, KreditversicherungenPage, and KreditversicherungTab in AdressenPage all working correctly. Fixed missing /api prefix in kreditversicherung router.
critical_code_review_comments: FIXED: Missing /api prefix in kreditversicherung.py router - changed from APIRouter(tags=['Kreditversicherung']) to APIRouter(prefix='/api', tags=['Kreditversicherung'])
seed_data_creation: Test Kreditversicherungen created with TEST-KV-001 prefix during API tests
context_for_next_testing_agent: Kreditversicherung feature fully tested and working. All CRUD operations, Positionen (Limits), Adressen linking, Kreditlimits, Kreditstatus, and Kreditpruefung APIs pass. Frontend shows KreditversicherungenPage at /kreditversicherungen and KreditversicherungTab in AdressenPage detail panel.

backend_kreditversicherungen_crud.POST_create: PASS - Creates new KV with ID
backend_kreditversicherungen_crud.GET_single: PASS - Returns single KV by ID

backend_positionen.POST_add_position: PASS - Adds limit position to KV

backend_kreditlimits_status.GET_kreditlimits: PASS - Returns all credit limits for address
backend_kreditlimits_status.GET_kreditstatus: PASS - Returns credit status with gesamtlimit, forderungen, verfuegbar, status

backend_kreditpruefung.POST_within_limit: PASS - Returns status 'ok' for amount within limit

frontend_navigation.kreditversicherung_in_stammdaten: PASS - Link visible under Stammdaten menu

frontend_kreditversicherungen_page.data_table: PASS - Table with columns: Nummer, Versicherer, Aktuelles Limit, Kunden, Status

frontend_kreditversicherung_tab.tab_visible: PASS - Tab visible in AdressenPage detail panel
frontend_kreditversicherung_tab.tab_content: PASS - Shows 'Keine Kreditversicherungen vorhanden' when empty

bugs_fixed.issue: Router missing /api prefix - endpoints were at /kreditversicherungen instead of /api/kreditversicherungen
